name: The Creator (Cacique Indie Game Art, IanPeter)
name_original: The Creator (Cacique Indie Game Art, IanPeter)
description:
THE CREATOR  was developed for the first GDevelop 5 game jam with the theme "Build and or rebuild".

The idea of the game makes the player feel like a god making his own universe.

For this construction it is necessary some chemical elements such as O2(Oxygen), Ch4(Methane), C(Carbon) and others.

In each level of the game you will have to create a different planet by combining the right elements. Access the instructions field from the question mark icon in the lower right corner of the screen. The goal in the end is to create a planet with life.

Note: The chemical compositions in the game are not exactly like in real life. Carefully read the hints on the question mark icon and find the correct combination to create the planet.

Controls

Everything works with the mouse or touch the screen if you are on the smartphone.

Double click: Camera zoom 

Space: Open the build panel

LShift: Open the help panel

: Restart Game

The game was developed by Lucas Faustino from the channelEu sou o Professor Lucas and by Ian Peter of the channel Criar um game.
